import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const AboutSection = () => { return (

About Us

About Pack For Camp

Pack for CampTM is a family-run online store.

We offer everything you need for summer camp under one roof.

Our products include:

  • Soft trunks
  • Name labels
  • Clip-on fans
  • Bedding
  • Laundry accessories
  • Storage solutions

Smart Packing List

Purchase your entire camp list in one click.

Browse collections at your own pace.

Our Story

Founded by Gaby Fachler and Melissa Goldwag.

A husband and wife team with deep camping roots.

Our Experience

Melissa: Former camp counselor and lifeguard.

Gaby: Former camper and head counselor.

Family Business

40 years of camp supply experience.

Based in South Fallsburg, NY.

"Easy to use website."

"Amazing customer service."

"Fast delivery."

- Chumi Rubin
{/* קישור לדף צור קשר*/}

Press here to contact us

); }; export default AboutSection;
